app.name: Mindful Journal
app.description: A therapeutic journaling platform with AI-powered insights for mental health and personal growth

content.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Mindful Journal - your AI-powered companion for mental wellness and therapeutic reflection
content.aboutText: Mindful Journal combines evidence-based therapeutic techniques with AI insights to support your mental health journey. Our platform provides a safe, private space for reflection and growth.
content.privacyStatement: Your therapeutic data is completely private and stored locally. AI features are optional and only process data when explicitly requested. This application is not a substitute for professional therapy.

disclaimers: This application is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
Always seek the advice of qualified mental health professionals with questions about your mental health.
If you are experiencing a mental health crisis, please contact emergency services or a crisis hotline immediately.
The AI features provide supportive insights but are not a replacement for human therapeutic intervention.
